contents.name: isEnabled
contents.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether telemetry transmission is enabled.

contents.name: reportInterval
contents.description: Gets or sets the interval at which telemetry is reported.

contents.name: reportMode
contents.description: Sets the mode for sending the report.

enumValues.name: event
enumValues.description: Send only when an event occurs.

enumValues.name: periodic
enumValues.description: Send at the specified interval. It is not possible to detect multiple changes in value during the transmission interval.

enumValues.name: eventAndPeriodic
enumValues.description: Sent when an event occurs.It is also sent periodically at a specified interval.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Sets the time information for data reception.

fields.name: rssi
fields.description: Sets the RSSI value for data reception.

fields.name: mac
fields.description: Set the MAC address of the sensor.

fields.name: isMoving
fields.description: Set to True when motion is detected.

fields.name: isFalling
fields.description: Set to True when a fall is detected.

fields.name: batteryVoltage
fields.description: Set the battery voltage of the sensor.
